column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We both shared a medium Classic Malnati's pizza. With high expectations going in
column2: I was fairly disappointed in the quality. It was good
column3: but not spectacular by any means. The ground beef was menial
column4: and tasted like it could have been baked just a little longer. The cheese was evenly spread throughout the pie
column5: and the sauce was just okay. The crust was pretty good though
column6: buttery crust and crispy on the edges.
